title: Ticket #1973: condor_status -collector requires ADMIN access
description:
During the 7.5.6 upgrade of NMI, we discovered that condor_status -collector requires ADMIN access (whereas condor_status obviously does not). This likely originates from protecting the collector ads of the Condor world collector.

However, we should think about this policy more carefully and definitely provide a better error message than "Communication Error".
creator: cweiss
